creator: Merit International Inc.
descriptionHtml:
New Merit Member app for updated ACE accounts!

Merit partners with verified organizations to keep all of your valuable personal and professional achievements (known as merits) in one place. With Merit, your credentials are now represented by digital records that are authenticated, scannable, shareable, and free.

KEY FEATURES

*Accept New Merits -- Receive and accept credentials (in the form of digital merits) from Merit-verified organizations. Every new Merit you receive will appear in your pending tab. Accept them in the App to add them to your profile.

*Manage Merits -- Ensure that you have only the credentials that are valuable to you by declining and archive merits you don’t want.

*Protect Privacy -- Control access to your private data by determining which organizations and apps can access your merits.

*Enjoy for Free -- Merit is free for members to download and use!

Please note: Merit is only for members. If you need help accessing your Merit profile, please email us at help@merits.com
descriptionShort: Organize, access, and prove your credentials and achievements with Merit!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: - Assorted bug fixes from the first version.

title: Merit Member

creator: Merit International Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Merit partners with verified organizations to keep all of your valuable personal and professional achievements (known as merits) in one place. With Merit, your credentials are now represented by digital records that are authenticated, scannable, shareable, and free.

KEY FEATURES
*Accept New Merits -- Receive and accept credentials (in the form of digital merits) from Merit-verified organizations. Every new Merit you receive will appear in your pending tab. Accept them in the App to add them to your profile.

*Manage Merits -- Ensure that you have only the credentials that are valuable to you with the ability to accept and decline merits.

*Protect Privacy -- Control access to your private data by determining which organizations and apps can access your merits.

*Enjoy for Free -- The Merit app is free for merit recipients to download and use!

Please note: Merit is only for members. If you need help accessing your Merit profile, please email us at help@merits.com.
